tool_description: Monitors system resources including CPU, memory, disk I/O, and network usage during load testing to identify resource constraints.

target_servers.description: List of server hostnames or IP addresses to monitor

monitoring_interval_seconds.description: Frequency of resource sampling in seconds (1-300)

network_threshold_mbps.description: Network throughput alert threshold in Mbps

collect_process_details.description: Whether to collect detailed process-level metrics

authentication_token.description: Authentication token for accessing server metrics

retry_count.description: Number of retry attempts for failed connections (0-10)

error_messages: Server connection failed: Unable to connect to one or more target servers. Verify hostnames, network connectivity, and authentication credentials
Invalid monitoring interval: Interval must be between 1 and 300 seconds
Invalid threshold values: All threshold percentages must be between 1 and 100
Authentication failed: Invalid or expired authentication token
Permission denied: Insufficient privileges to access system metrics on target servers
usage: Specify target_servers array with hostnames/IPs to monitor. Configure monitoring_interval_seconds and threshold values for alerts. Use authentication_token if servers require authentication.

monitoring_session_id.description: Unique identifier for this monitoring session

avg_cpu_usage.description: Average CPU usage percentage across all servers

avg_memory_usage.description: Average memory usage percentage across all servers

alerts_triggered.description: List of threshold alerts that were triggered
